content: क्लम् {c1c} {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (क्लामति, क्लाम्यति, क्लांत) {@--1@} To be fatigued or tired, be exhausted or depressed; न चक्लाम न विव्यथे <ls>Bk. 5. 102</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">14. 101.</ls> {@--2@} To feel sorry, pine for; <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (क्लमयति-ते) To fatigue, exhaust, depress, wither; <ls>U. 3. 30.</ls>
